title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB:
Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when I perform the following steps:

1. Close all editors
2. Create a new file f1.txt
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the File menu

Observed Behavior: Nothing happens.
EB: Expected Behavior: The 'Close All Saved' operation should close the file 'f1.txt' as no changes have been made.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:

1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code
2. Close all currently opened editors
3. Create a new file 'f1.txt'
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the File menu
